channel.title: +Application layer on Vishvas's notes
channel.description: Recent content in +Application layer on Vishvas's notes

item.title: DNS
item.description: Domain name To connect to an application on a remote computer, one needs to know the IP address of that computer, which is often supplied to the application externally - by a user for example. Strings, called domain names, tend to be easier to remember than IP addresses. Translation So domain name resolution can be considered a sub-module used for translating domain names to IP addresses. Hierarchy Domain names take the form A.
